You simply can not understand the US Constitution, and all that it is supposed to mean, without this following preamble. And chances are it's not in any of your High School's text books, College's text books, or some of your history books.
 
 http://www.billofrights.org/
 
 The following site gives a sorrowfully short explaination of what the declaratory and restrictive clause means.
 
 http://www.harbornet.com/rights/lindat.html
